Hôtel De La Marine: An Architectural Treasure
this_title: Hôtel de la Marine, renaissance d'un palais
trans_title: Das Hotel de la Marine: Ein Museum für französische Lebensart
Hôtel De La Marine: An Architectural Treasure
introduction: The Hôtel de la Marine is an iconic building on Place de la Concorde in Paris, where nearly one million tourists walk by every day. After months of restauration, the hôtel has recently reopened its doors, which pleases a great number of people. Its exceptional destiny, bonded with France's destiny, is revealed by the great restauration works led by the Centre des Monuments Nationaux. 250 years of history lie within the walls of this landmark of 18th century architecture.Narrator: Jean RousselotProducers: Match Prod & [Imagissime](https://www.imagissime.productions/fr/nos-productions/hotel-de-la-marine-renaissance-d-un-palais)Broadcaster: Arte, Planète+ Canada
chinese_title: Hôtel de la Marine, renaissance d'un palais
